The Gansu earthquake caused cracks in the student dormitories built by Lanzhou Jiaotong University in 2017. On December 21, the school covered the cracks with paint.

On December 21, a parent posted that on the day of the earthquake, his daughter, a senior at Sichuan Normal University, fainted while being evacuated downstairs. The school did not take any emergency measures at the time, and missed the golden rescue time.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 22, the State Administration of Press and Publication issued the "Online Game Management Measures (Draft for Comments)", which imposed comprehensive restrictions on online game recharges. Subsequently, related companies plummeted, with NetEase falling more than 28% during the session and Tencent Holdings falling more than 15%; A-share game stocks also fell collectively in the afternoon, with Baotong Technology hitting the 20cm limit, and Chinese Online, Palm Technology, Kunlun Wanwei, Yaoji Technology, and Sanqi Interactive Entertainment all falling more than 10% or hitting the limit.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Is the patriotism of the type that touches porcelain a thing of the past?"
On December 22, the Ministry of Public Security held a press conference and announced that it would crack down on Internet celebrities who spread rumors, "create hot spots", "take advantage of hot spots", and "set the pace" in accordance with the law.

content: On December 22, the Shandong Zibo State Financial Supervision and Administration Bureau and other units launched the "Find a partner to spend the New Year together" activity

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 22, Guizhou.
An old man held up his ID card and said that his fireworks factory was built in 1998. It stopped production due to the epidemic, and then obtained the right to operate the farm with the consent of relevant departments.
On November 30, the local government sent people to demolish his farm. The old man came out to stop it, but was beaten with steel bars by the demolition team. Not only that, but even thousands of chickens raised in the farm were taken away by the demolition team.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
December 21, Xu Village, Haining, Zhejiang. The old lady picked up the girl's mobile phone and asked for 1,000 yuan, saying that if she didn't pay, she would throw the phone into the river.
The girl called the police, but the police were unable to get the phone back. In the end, after negotiating for an afternoon, she gave the old lady 1,000 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On the evening of December 21, Liaocheng City, Shandong Province.
In the Park Capital Community, the real estate company forcibly reclaimed the parking spaces and asked the owners to buy parking spaces, otherwise the owners would not be allowed to enter the community, which caused strong dissatisfaction among the owners.
In the weather of minus 15 degrees, a large number of owners were blocked at the door, and there were fierce conflicts and shoves with the security guards.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On December 21, around 8:30 in the morning, in the Lihuacheng community in Haikou, Hainan, the security guard heard a baby crying in the trash can. After opening the lid of the trash can, he found a newborn baby girl in a plastic bag, and the umbilical cord was not cut off.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
❤Good People in China
On December 21, a blogger in Xi'an, Shaanxi Province, released a video saying that he met an older woman standing at the door of a hospital holding a piece of paper that said "Free food and lodging". At first, the blogger did not believe it, but after following the older woman back, he found that the children in the house were lying on the table watching TV, the cabinets were full of various medicines, and the woman in the kitchen was cooking dinner.
Sister Chang said that she was not rich and all the expenses were borne by herself. Because she saw many patients and their families sleeping on the streets at the door of the hospital, she thought of setting up Xinyu Home to provide free food and lodging for these families who had difficulty seeing a doctor.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 21, in Sanya, Hainan, a woman posted a message online asking for help, saying that Sanya No. 9 Primary School had owed dozens of teachers wages from December 2022 to January 2023 for a year. During this period, she had written to the city's 12345 and the Letters and Calls Bureau many times, but the problem was not resolved in the end.

content:
What do you think is the Chinese character of the year in 2023?

So far, according to the likes of netizens in the previous comment area, the four characters "collapse", "Xi", "win", and "decline" have received the highest number of likes.
Now everyone is welcome to vote for the Chinese character of the year that best represents 2023 in your mind.
You are also welcome to express your opinions in the comment area.
